PROC-001.name: API Synthesis and Purification
PROC-001.description: Complete process for synthesizing and purifying the Active Pharmaceutical Ingredient (API) from raw materials

PROC-002.name: Formulation and Manufacturing
PROC-002.description: Process of combining API with excipients and manufacturing final dosage forms

PROC-003.name: Quality Control and Packaging
PROC-003.description: Final quality testing and primary/secondary packaging of finished dosage forms

SUBP-001-01.name: Chemical Synthesis
SUBP-001-01.description: Multi-step chemical synthesis of the API using controlled reaction conditions

SUBP-001-02.name: Purification and Crystallization
SUBP-001-02.description: Isolation and purification of crude API to achieve required purity specifications

SUBP-001-03.name: Drying and Milling
SUBP-001-03.description: Final drying and particle size reduction of purified API

SUBP-002-01.name: Pre-formulation and Blending
SUBP-002-01.description: Preparation of API-excipient blend with uniform distribution

SUBP-002-02.name: Tablet Compression
SUBP-002-02.description: Compression of granulated blend into tablets with defined specifications

SUBP-002-03.name: Coating and Finishing
SUBP-002-03.description: Application of film coating and final finishing operations

SUBP-003-01.name: Final Quality Testing
SUBP-003-01.description: Comprehensive quality control testing of finished product

SUBP-003-02.name: Primary Packaging
SUBP-003-02.description: Blister packaging or bottle filling of finished tablets

SUBP-003-03.name: Secondary Packaging and Labeling
SUBP-003-03.description: Cartoning, labeling, and preparation for distribution

TASK-001-01-01.name: Raw Material Dispensing
TASK-001-01-01.description: Accurate weighing and dispensing of starting materials and reagents according to batch formula

TASK-001-01-02.name: Reaction Setup
TASK-001-01-02.description: Configure reaction vessel with temperature control, stirring mechanism, and inert atmosphere

TASK-001-01-03.name: Controlled Addition
TASK-001-01-03.description: Sequential addition of reagents with real-time monitoring of temperature and pH

TASK-001-01-04.name: Reaction Monitoring
TASK-001-01-04.description: HPLC sampling and analysis to track reaction progress and completion

TASK-001-01-05.name: Quenching and Workup
TASK-001-01-05.description: Safe termination of reaction and initial separation of product from reaction mixture

TASK-001-02-01.name: Solvent Extraction
TASK-001-02-01.description: Liquid-liquid extraction to remove impurities and isolate crude product

TASK-001-02-02.name: Column Chromatography
TASK-001-02-02.description: Silica gel chromatographic separation for intermediate purification

TASK-001-02-03.name: Recrystallization
TASK-001-02-03.description: Controlled crystallization from optimal solvent system to achieve final purity

TASK-001-02-04.name: Filtration and Washing
TASK-001-02-04.description: Vacuum filtration and washing of crystals to remove residual impurities

TASK-001-03-01.name: Vacuum Drying
TASK-001-03-01.description: Controlled vacuum drying at specified temperature to remove residual solvents

TASK-001-03-02.name: LOD Testing
TASK-001-03-02.description: Loss on drying test to verify moisture content meets specifications

TASK-001-03-03.name: Milling and Sieving
TASK-001-03-03.description: Controlled milling to achieve target particle size distribution

TASK-001-03-04.name: Final API Storage
TASK-001-03-04.description: Transfer purified API to labeled containers and storage under controlled conditions

TASK-002-01-01.name: Excipient Screening
TASK-002-01-01.description: Verification and approval of all excipients against COA and specifications

TASK-002-01-02.name: Pre-mixing
TASK-002-01-02.description: Geometric dilution mixing of API with primary excipients

TASK-002-01-03.name: High-Shear Granulation
TASK-002-01-03.description: Wet granulation process to improve flow and compressibility

TASK-002-01-04.name: Drying and Sizing
TASK-002-01-04.description: Fluid bed drying and screening of granules to target specifications

TASK-002-01-05.name: Final Blending
TASK-002-01-05.description: Addition of lubricants and final blending in V-blender

TASK-002-01-06.name: Blend Uniformity Testing
TASK-002-01-06.description: Sampling and assay of blend to verify content uniformity

TASK-002-02-01.name: Machine Setup and Qualification
TASK-002-02-01.description: Setup and qualification of tablet press with appropriate tooling

TASK-002-02-02.name: Compression Run
TASK-002-02-02.description: Continuous tablet compression with in-process monitoring

TASK-002-02-03.name: IPC Testing
TASK-002-02-03.description: In-process control testing for weight, thickness, hardness, and friability

TASK-002-02-04.name: Tablet Collection
TASK-002-02-04.description: Collection and quarantine of compressed tablets for coating

TASK-002-03-01.name: Coating Solution Preparation
TASK-002-03-01.description: Preparation and verification of film coating suspension

TASK-002-03-02.name: Film Coating Application
TASK-002-03-02.description: Application of film coating in perforated pan coater

TASK-002-03-03.name: Coating Quality Inspection
TASK-002-03-03.description: Visual inspection and weight gain verification of coated tablets

TASK-002-03-04.name: Polishing
TASK-002-03-04.description: Tablet polishing to remove coating dust and improve appearance

TASK-002-03-05.name: Bulk Storage
TASK-002-03-05.description: Transfer coated tablets to labeled containers for quarantine

TASK-003-01-01.name: Appearance and Identification
TASK-003-01-01.description: Visual inspection and identity testing by FTIR/UV spectroscopy

TASK-003-01-02.name: Assay and Related Substances
TASK-003-01-02.description: HPLC analysis for content and impurity profile

TASK-003-01-03.name: Dissolution Testing
TASK-003-01-03.description: Multi-point dissolution testing to verify release profile

TASK-003-01-04.name: Microbial Testing
TASK-003-01-04.description: Total aerobic count and absence of specified microorganisms

TASK-003-02-01.name: Packaging Material Verification
TASK-003-02-01.description: Verification of blister foils, PVC, and labels against specifications

TASK-003-02-02.name: Blister Line Setup
TASK-003-02-02.description: Setup and calibration of blister packaging machine

TASK-003-02-03.name: Blister Packaging Run
TASK-003-02-03.description: Automated blister forming, filling, and sealing operation

TASK-003-02-04.name: Vision Inspection
TASK-003-02-04.description: Automated vision system inspection for missing or damaged tablets

TASK-003-02-05.name: Seal Integrity Testing
TASK-003-02-05.description: Random sampling and seal strength testing of blister packs

TASK-003-03-01.name: Carton Printing Verification
TASK-003-03-01.description: Verification of printed cartons for correct product information and batch details

TASK-003-03-02.name: Cartoning Operation
TASK-003-03-02.description: Automated insertion of blisters into cartons with patient information leaflet

TASK-003-03-03.name: Serialization
TASK-003-03-03.description: Application of unique serial numbers and 2D barcodes for track and trace

TASK-003-03-04.name: Case Packing
TASK-003-03-04.description: Packing of cartons into shipping cases with batch documentation

TASK-003-03-05.name: Final Release Sampling
TASK-003-03-05.description: Retention sampling and transfer to QA for final batch disposition

TASK-003-03-06.name: Warehouse Transfer
TASK-003-03-06.description: Transfer of finished goods to quarantine warehouse pending final release
